item.title: Managing the Seasons
item.description: A Quiet Battle During the last year it has been very obvious that our country as a whole has been having a tough time.

item.title: A Season of Gratitude
item.description: It has taken a long time for me to finally sit in front of my computer and actually start typing for this next post.

item.title: The Village
item.description: As we come to the end of October, which is Down Syndrome Awareness Month, Iâ€™m often reminded of one of the most important parts of our parenting journey: our village.

item.title: Siblings
item.description: I remember the day my son Miles was born. It was in May.

item.title: Where It All Began...
item.description: I’ve always wanted to be a mom. I was the first-born in a family of three and I think I’ve always fit into that stereotypical “first-born” mold.
